ComicInfo.Summary: Neela Archer is lost somewhere in the cosmos and her transformative experiences are just beginning! Meanwhile on Earth, the corridors of power are now conspiring against Adam Archer. Will they make a move against humanity's evolutionary emissary? And who the hell is THE SAVAGE STING?!

ComicInfo.Title: O Sister, Where Art Thou?
